title: ABCD Juice | Healthy Drink 🙂
content:
Healthy Drink: ABCD Juice Servings: 2 Duration: 10 minutes Refreshing and freshly homemade juices are always best than store bought juices. Today, I'm sharing healthy juice with some handful ingredients they're super rich in vitamins and minerals. If you would like to improve your health appearance then this Juice is your best choice, have it at least 4-5 days in a week. It's better to consume immediately and perfect during early mornings or one hour prior to breakfast. No added sugar or color to this juice, it's fresh, easy, healthy and I made it delicious 😋 . I hope you like it 👍 Let's start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Apple - 1 - Peeled off & diced
  • Beet root - 1/2 - Peeled off & grated
  • Cucumber - 1 mini sized - peeled off & diced
  • Carrot - 1 - peeled off & grated
  • Dates - fresh - 5 - de seeded
  • Lemon juice - 1 tb sp
  • Pumpkin seeds - 2 tsp
  • Honey - 2 tb sp (optional)
  • Water - 500 ml - 1/2 ltr
Procedure:
  • Take a juicer, add chopped apple, cucumber, grated Carrot and beet root along with pumpkin seeds, dates, lemon juice, water & honey
  • Blend till smooth puree
  • By using colander extract the juice
  • Press the pulp with spoon to extract more juice
  • Juice is ready to serve
  • ABCD Juice is served with pumpkin seeds. Instead of pumpkin seeds you can also add chia seeds or kalonji seeds
  • Happy cooking & Enjoy your weekend 🙂
